name: AERO-CAR
description:
A car joined together with an aeroplane. Future technology reserved only for the elite. YOU have stolen it from the government, and now they're coming to get you. Control a team of jetpack-wielding citizens, willing to sacrifice their lives in order to create a better society!

Made for GMTK2021 by @blamekitsune, @sklarper and @wahoo_harold on Twitter.
